nodes.bodyText: Hmm.. I gave this some thought and ended up rewriting the create/update classes without using AutoValue. This is a lot more consistent with UserRecord's request classes. It will also make it easier to serialize these into json requests.

nodes.bodyText: I think we should just set the tenantId. Other parameters will not be set, which means they won't be updated in the back-end.
Define a constant for this and avoid duplication.
These last 3 assertions are probably redundant since you've already tested for size == 1
